attributes.action: Encourage Jacob Rees-Mogg to stand as Conservative Prime Minister.
attributes.background: Jacob Rees-Mogg is a sound Conservative who sticks to his beliefs and will be able to re unite the party, with sound reasoning. He is also visually satisfying to the ladies. As we need a strong leader with charisma who can get things done, especially after the referendum, he is the man for the job.

rejection.details: In any case, as you might already know, the Prime Minister of the UK is not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament, and any decision to stand for leadership of the Conservative party would be a matter for Mr Rees-Mogg himself.
